Package org.nerd4j.csv.conf.mapping.ann

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotatedConfigurationFactory
    Creates a CSVConfiguration reading the related CSV annotation from a given bean.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    CSVColumn
    Maps a JavaBean property to a CSV column.
    CSVFieldConverter
    Performs type conversion between the value of a CSV column and the related data model field and vice versa.
    CSVFieldProcessor
    Represents the processor able to perform the validations and conversions needed to translate a CSV column value into the related data model field and vice versa.
    CSVFieldValidator
    Performs validation over the values of a CSV column or the related data model field.
    CSVFormatter
    Creates a CSVFormatter using the annotated JavaBean to retrieve the required configurations.
    CSVParam
    Represents a custom parameter in the configuration of a CSV handling element.
    CSVParser
    Creates a CSVParser using the annotated JavaBean to retrieve the required configurations.
    CSVReader
    Creates a CSVReader using the annotated JavaBean to retrieve the required configurations.
    CSVWriter
    Creates a CSVWriter using the annotated JavaBean to retrieve the required configurations.
